allow: Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "py -c ""import pandas as pd; df=pd.read_csv\(''docs/run_order.csv''\); print\(''Shape:'', df.shape\); print\(''Columns:'', df.columns.tolist\(\)\); print\(''\\nFirst 3 rows:''\); print\(df.head\(3\)[[''script_id'', ''depends_on'', ''reads_primary'']].to_string\(index=False\)\)""")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "py -c ""import csv; r=open\(''docs/run_order.csv'',''r'',encoding=''utf-8'',newline=''''\); rows=list\(csv.reader\(r\)\); r.close\(\); print\(''Total rows:'', len\(rows\)\); print\(''Header cols:'', len\(rows[0]\)\); print\(''Data row cols:'', [len\(row\) for row in rows[1:6]]\); assert all\(len\(row\)==9 for row in rows\), ''Column count mismatch''; print\(''OK: All rows have 9 columns''\)""")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "py -c ""import pandas as pd; df=pd.read_csv\(''docs/run_order.csv''\); k5_14=df[df[''script_id''].isin\([''K05_MAIN'',''K06_MAIN'',''K07_MAIN'',''K08_MAIN'',''K09_MAIN'',''K10_MAIN'',''K11_MAIN'',''K12_MAIN'',''K13_MAIN'',''K14_MAIN'',''K17_MAIN'']\)]; print\(k5_14[[''script_id'',''depends_on'']].to_string\(index=False\)\); print\(''\\nAll depends_on empty?'', k5_14[''depends_on''].isna\(\).all\(\)\)""")

Bash(powershell.exe -NoProfile -Command "py -c ""import pandas as pd; df=pd.read_csv\(''docs/run_order.csv''\); main=df[df[''script_id''].str.contains\(''_MAIN'',na=False\)]; print\(''_MAIN scripts with Grep-verified notes:''\); print\(main[[''script_id'',''notes'']].to_string\(index=False\)\); print\(''\\n\\nAll contain Grep-verified?'', main[''notes''].str.contains\(''Grep-verified'',na=False\).all\(\)\)""")
